author: jleroux
msg: java.util.regex.Pattern instances are immutable but not instances of the Matcher companion class.
So better be safe than sorry, even if in the loops we loose a bit of performance (here only "short" loops anyway)

author: kwright
msg: Fixes for CONNECTORS-13.  Refactor lock manager to support ZooKeeper locking and shared configuration, and also provide both a file and a zookeeper multi-process example.
